profiles.description: The IPS-N Heavy Howitzer-Shotgun 155 “Cannibal” is a large, breech-loaded, over-under cannon chambered to fire shells, shot, and sabots. This is the higher-powered version of the HHS-075, designed to phase out the “Daisy Cutter” by providing comparable stopping power in a format that can be more easily supplied to armies in the field. The Cannibal should be used with caution around mixed units of friendlies, as its ejection action clears the weapon’s barrels of spent cartridges with enough velocity to decapitate unarmored personnel.
profiles.name: Single Barrel

profiles.effect: Fire both barrels at once, causing the weapon to be fired with +1 Difficulty and requiring a reload as normal.
